message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $95. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know if you're interested!
Hey Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $95 is a bit high for me.  I'm willing to pay $85 for the product.  Let me know what you think!

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $85 is a bit low for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $90.  This is a fair price for both of us, and it will allow us to reach a deal. Let me know what you think!

Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $90 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $88. This is a fair price for both of us, and it will help us reach a deal. Let me know what you think!
